If you'd like to come and check out the impact of what you have helped to create with your donations, we are offering accommodation packages on either of our boats!  We are also offering all-inclusive nights, boat exclusive nights, luxury nights and luxury exclusive nights!  And the great part is you can come and use your perk as soon as this campaign is over because the boats are already open!

Innfinity - 105 foot boat with 5 bedrooms and 4 baths






Laid Back - 65 foot boat with 2 bedrooms and 1 bath




If you want more than one night, grab a couple and we can book them back to back for you too!

Below are some videos that showcase a few things that you can enjoy if you choose to grab one of these accommodation perks!  






Scott Rowles - The Mechanic
The man with the plan and the boats. The mechanical, electrical, epoxy, plumbing..... Mr. Fixitallandmakeitwork.  He has been living on boats for almost two decades and loves introducing people to his love of float life!
Kerry Rowles - The Accountant 

Calculator guy, well....graduated to Quickbooks.  He acts as the father figure for the company (along with actually being Scott's father).

Mark Miller - The Paddler 





Our graphic designer and on board SUP specialist. He is a well traveled entrepreneur that recently moved to FL from the Midwest. He lives vicariously through himself.
Andrea Benninger - The Local

Our experience creator extraordinaire.  Whether it is helping to set up your perfect event spread or giving you recommendations on restaurants or teaching you how to paddle board.  Her love of the water comes through in everything she does.
Ronan - The Dog



He once taught a German shepherd how to bark in Spanish.  Just kidding, but he could definitely teach you a thing or two about how to relax around the water.....he has it mastered.  Just don't fall for the puppy dog eyes!





 Are you making a difference in our business?  Absolutely!  We will be able to provide the same level of service just in a carbon neutral footprint!  But it is not just our little footprint on the earth that we will be changing.  
Think about it....vacation accommodations are big energy consumers.  People go on vacation and indulge.  If they normally set the air conditioner at 77 degrees at home because they have to pay the bill, they splurge when they are on vacation and run it down to a chilly 67.  And vacation locations want to make sure their guests are happy so they over light, over heat, over cool all of their amenities to make sure their guests have the best time and return to see them again! 
If we could help to influence adoption of alternative energies at vacation accommodations.....the impact could be huge.




 We have already installed and maintained wind and solar power systems on multiple boats (Tubi and Tri-Muirin shown below), so actually getting the system up and running is just a wee bit of sweat and perseverance.  The biggest risks we face are that we will not reaching our campaign milestones and then will not be able to actually unplug from the grid.







 So, you are not able to contribute to our eco-ization of the accommodation industry, but you can help spread the word.  Please pass the word to family and friends!
Let them know that we are willing to put in the effort and change our business to be a better world citizen!





This is just the first phase of our Green Business Initiative!  If you help us get to this goal, we vow to come back with follow-on campaigns to continue to turn our offerings completely green!
We also want to extend our business to help preserve and provide Eco conscious access to some of the most pristine, private and beautiful barrier islands that Florida has to offer....come with us on our journey!





How often have you looked at vacation options in our country and wish that you could go to a "private eco resort" island in OUR country that treated the land, water and animals with respect and preserved them for the future.
Florida undeveloped coastal land is becoming extinct.  If you have been to Florida, you have seen what development and tourism has done to Miami, Clearwater, Naples and more.  We want to help PRESERVE, but still provide "walk lightly" access to some of the last, natural islands in the Tampa Bay area!
We have identified a multiple island location within 30 minutes of a major airport in Florida that we could acquire and turn into a eco-friendly vacation location that not only is environmentally friendly in its use, but also in how the accommodations are built up.
Minimally invasive flora removal to locate the necessary buildings to support our boats access to the land and amenities with hand carrying and clearing to ensure we only "tread" on what we absolutely have to.....and we will keep 90% of the land in its natural condition!








How often have you looked at vacation options in our country and wished that the owners had any idea how simple it can be to make the facility kind to nature.  Our new facility would use sustainable materials for the build.  
We will again power it completely with solar and wind power to be a 100% sustainable location and we can get our eco-cyling going much stronger with our own landside presence!  
We will use composting toilets so that we turn the waste that WE produce into fertilizer for the flora that we LEFT when we built the accommodations.  
We will be fresh water neutral: we will install our own desalinization portable system running on OUR solar and wind energy to harvest fresh water for life from the sea as well as converting all of our boats with this fresh water supply!


We will also need LPG for cooking and laundry, but we also have great options to make that need sustainable as well.  It also just so happens that we can help support our other fellow Crowdfunders.  By implementing our own gas creation system, we will also be able to create an eco-cycle for that need as well.  This gas supply will run our cooking, laundry and more on both land and our boats!(https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/homebiogas-create-your-own-energy-environment-green/x/14560409#/)
We will have salt water swimming pools with solar powered heating and cooling that made the pool chemical free, but also energy neutral.  








This particular area has approximately a dozen small islands that are all private and for sale.  In the future, we would like to continue our preservation with small, private,  Eco-friendly bungalows on each island connected to the very first island via an electric ferry boat that is charged by our solar arrays!!!




We can do this, we can build the case that shows that it is feasible and viable, we can make a difference and we can lead our industry and country forward.......................................................with your help!

story:
GREEN LIGHT, GO! 

We (Skye Chamberlain and Ramesh Puttan) are a married couple from Seattle Washington.  I have been an educator in Waldorf schools for the past 20 years and Ramesh is a long time IT professional.

Now that our children are grown and out leading productive lives, we decided that it was time for us to make a contribution to the defining struggle of our times, to work to decrease the use of fossil fuels and turn the tides on global warming that produces destructive climate change.

Over the past quarter century we have developed strong local logistical support in India,  especially in the states of Kerala, Bihar and Uttarkhand. Our deep-rooted connections with India, and our great commitment, will help us to successfully complete this project about which we are so passionate.

 

COST TRADE OFF ANALYSIS

RENEWABLE vs FOSSIL FUEL GRID

The above graph shows a comparative Cost Trade Off Analysis for producing 10 KW of energy using Renewables versus Fossil-fuels for a period of 10 years in India.

Renewables like Photo Voltaic (PV) and Wind Energy need initial investment, but the long term benefits economically, socially and environmentally are too enormous to quantify in mere numbers alone.

The blue line, representing Fossil fuel, has the lowest initial investment but has a high running cost for a 10 year period. This high running cost is both monetary and environmental, which we as a planet can no longer afford.

 

DEMOCRATIZING THE POWER GRID PROJECT

Vinayasun is proud to partner with Sevalaya, a reputed charitable organization located in the outskirts of Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. Sevalaya has been engaged in much-needed social developmental work there for more than 30 years. 

http://sevalaya.org/

Our project, Democratizing the Power Grid, replicates Sevalaya's well-designed Solar Micro Power Grid in other parts of India.

Sevalaya generates most of its electricity from its Solar Power based Smart Power Grid used to run its Schools, Student Hostels, Old Age Home and farm equipment needed for Organic Farming.

Please take a look at Sevalaya’s Green Micro Power Grid project video to see a working sample of our project .

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MNi--Sed25k

 

PROJECT COST ESTIMATE for 15 KW SOLAR MICRO POWER GRID

Access to energy is the corner stone for bringing overall development that can uplift the quality of life in a rural community. An estimated 300 million people in India currently have no power will most likely be on the grid by 2020.

At Vinayasun, we want to ensure that India’s rural electrification and its million telecom towers, are powered by green energy and not by coal or diesel fuel.

As you know, renewables like solar and wind energy need initial investment.  However, the great part is that once they are up and running they have low cost maintenance, generate income and create employment.

To make this possible we will need the help of like-minded people. Together we could make a great difference in the lives of marginalized people and help stop Global Warming, making sure that we turn the tide against Climate Change and protect our precious planet.

Thank you for your support.

Skye & Ramesh

story:
One elephant can generate as much as US$1.6 million in tourism revenues over its lifetime. That’s around 75 times more than what that animal’s tusks could be sold for on an ivory market in China in 2014. Today, it’s probably worth even less than that.  No country ever developed its economy on the back of wildlife trade, and no country ever will.

In September, this year, at the Conference of the Parties to CITES (CoP17) in Johannesburg, crucial decisions concerning the future of African elephants will be made. With 182 parties to CITES, It is viewed by many as one of the world’s most important Multilateral Environmental Agreements, and it is here that we have a chance to alter the course of history in favour of our elephants. 

You have an opportunity to help tell the story of Africa’s remaining elephants, through a stunning visual exhibition,  to those who will decide their fate this September at CITES.  If we’re successful, it could lead to the closing of ivory markets - which is the true driver of elephant’s demise. 

Our elephants have so much to teach us. Do we dare imagine what we’ll say to our grandchildren as we show them pictures of elephants on Instagram while we awkwardly explain away their complete eradication under our very noses?

Let us stand together in unity to create a different reality for the generations who will follow us. Support our campaign.

Who: Stop Ivory

What: The Story of Africa’s remaining elephants and the battle to bring an iconic species back from the brink

Where: CITES Conference, September 2016, Johannesburg

Why: Time is running out; the CITES Conference may be our last chance

“Over 100,000 elephants have been killed in the last 3 years, a pile that would reach the international space station.”

_____________________________________________________________________________

Hello, my name is Martin Middlebrook, an English photographer. I am working with independent Non-government Organisation ‘Stop Ivory’ on the creation of a compelling exhibition and book, to be showcased in September 2016, to help save the African Elephant from extinction.

Stop Ivory, through the African founded and African led Elephant Protection Initiative (EPI) is the focal point for African efforts to conserve elephants. They have had extraordinary success changing the legal status of ivory in many countries, with the EPI now boasting 12 African Range State members.

THE FACTS:

  • Around 60% of African elephants have been slaughtered in the last 10 years.
  • Over 100,000 elephants have been killed in the last 3 years, a pile that would reach the international space station.
  • Nearly 100 elephants are being killed every day.
  • Poaching has been linked to organised crime and some terrorist groups
  • This illegal activity threatens the integrity of ecosystems, local livelihoods and poses a risk to national and international security.

On the 30th April 2016, The Kenyan Wildlife Services will burn over 100 tonnes of confiscated and collected ivory, in a symbolic statement, at Nairobi’s National Park

THE PROJECT

This September, we have an opportunity to present a compelling case to decision makers at the moment they cast their vote on legally binding policy for elephant protection.

The photographs will be published in book and exhibited at this years CITES Conference of the Parties in Johannesburg, South Africa. CITES is the UN based global institution charged with the regulation and laws surrounding the trade in endangered species.

The portfolio of work represents not only the elephants themselves, but also the extraordinary people with whom they coexist - conservationists and communities alike.

We have already completed the first chapter following a trip to Kenya. Now, we must repeat the process to broaden the visual scope and ensure we illustrate the bigger picture. To fulfill the projects potential, we plan to visit at least three more countries: Botswana, Gabon and China.

Please sign up to this project:

Your support will help us continue to deliver the most compelling message where it is needed to most effectively ensure a future for one of the world’s most important species. For all of us involved, an Africa without elephants is unimaginable. We must do all we can to prevent this indiscriminate killing.

“The question is, are we happy to suppose that our grandchildren may never be able to see an elephant except in a picture book?”

Sir David Attenborough

Your donation will play an important part in our very simple ambition – to save the African Elephant from extinction. By exhibiting at the CITES conference, Stop Ivory will illustrate why this sorrowful slaughter of one of the world’s greatest creatures to satisfy a human lust to own objects made of its teeth must stop once and for all.

Project Costs:

The money we are asking for will cover the cost of creating the assignment images (flights, accommodation, fixers, park entry fees, visas etc) across at least three additional countries, pay for the production and installation of the exhibition, and the design and printing of the supporting book.

story:
We believe in the healing power of food.  We believe that food can heal the body,
the mind, the soul, and the spirit.  We believe that food is a gift from the divine maternal spirit of the planet, and that by learning about our connection to the
Earth through our food, we can heal ourselves, creating more space for
love, joy, compassion, and gratitude.

About this Campaign

The purpose of this campaign is to raise funds which will be used for purchasing acreage in the greater Winston Salem area and developing the infrastructure needed for an operational retreat center.  The retreat center will be a resilient, self-sustaining property designed in accordance with permaculture principles, and with an emphasis on physical, emotional and spiritual healing.  A few farm activities and retreat topics we’re expecting include permaculture design, natural buildings, biofuels, solar harvesting, hydroelectric and wind power generation, earthworks, grafting and tree propagation, vegetable production, bee keeping, meat production, food forestry, silvo-pasturing, coppicing, seed saving, seed germination, husbandry, cheese making, composting, vermiculture, aquaponics, soil remediation, mushroom cultivation, medicinal herb cultivation, essential oil distillation, aromatherapy,  yoga, meditation, Reiki, energy healing, qi gong, acupuncture, massage therapy, juice therapy, music therapy, nature therapy, probiotics, traditional Chinese medicine, and biodynamics.  Retreat topics will be non-sectarian.  We hope to host our first retreat in September, 2016.

At this time we recognize that now more than ever, it’s absolutely necessary for our human society to reestablish the connection to our food.  Our goal is to become stewards of the Earth and to reach out and connect with our fellow suffering humans.  This idea, The Food is Medicine Project, creates a bridge that can lead to balance, at the individual level, but also at the societal level, and even for the entire species.  Proper diet and nutrient intake are crucial to wellness.  Wellness is crucial to happiness.  Happiness is the stuff that makes life worthwhile. 

Who We Are

The Food is Medicine Project is an idea that the foods we put into our bodies can be highly effective medicines for treating a vast majority of the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual diseases currently plaguing the human population.  We recognize these illnesses as being a major obstacle preventing many of our human brothers and sisters from leading fulfilling lives.  We believe that Hippocrates’ notion to “let food be our medicine and medicine be our food” is a crucial piece of the puzzle as to why, when our technological and intellectual abilities are more developed than ever, our basic wellness is in its worst decline.  From the perspective of this philosophy it’s evident that part of the problem is our disconnection from the natural systems than sustain our existence.  We have forgotten that food is medicine, but we can remember, and we hope to help individuals in their personal healing processes through service and education.

Now more than ever our food is at the focus of many controversies.  Somewhere under the heap of arguments about vegetarianism, the omnivore’s dilemma, large scale industrial farming, GMOs, organic, labeling laws, free trade, high fructose corn syrup, cattle industry standards, poultry industry standards, the FDA, the raw milk controversy, celiac disease and a plethora of other food allergies and intolerances, there is a forgotten philosophy.  At the root of these issues is the forgotten concept that food is more than just fuel, eating is more than just a habitual activity, and that meals are more than just an opportunity to gather and socialize. 

Why We Chose Crowd Funding

Since it's our philosophy that we are all irrefutably connected, we are excited to participate in the crowd funding.  No other economic medium has ever existed that makes it so easy for us to spread our love and energy to so many others as efficiently.  The potential to connect to millions of individuals who may be interested in supporting your cause is nothing short of magic.  It reinforces part of our philosophy that there is an abundance of love and universal support for people when they’re pursuing their personal legends.  There are many projects out there that we at The Food is Medicine Project support and wish to see succeed, and we support many of them financially by making small pledges.  In honesty and vulnerability, we cannot downplay the discomfort experienced by the ego when campaigning for funds from family, friends and strangers.  It is uncomfortable to pull back the curtain, show the world your dreams and ask for their support.  But in our desires to be connected, to heal the gap of separation between our individual selves and our human brothers and sisters, we support this economic bridge called crowd funding and are grateful for the opportunity to participate.  “The hand that is open to give is also open to receive.”  May we give and receive freely with ever accumulating love and respect for each other, our dreams and our projects.

More About The Food Is Medicine Project

The word Medicine comes from the Latin nouns 'medi', meaning "middle, center, or balance point," and 'cinus', meaning "ruin, destruction, or chaos."  The word Medicine actually translates "to bring balance to that which was once in ruin," or "to return to balance that which has fallen into chaos."  Our philosophy is that Food IS Medicine!  We believe that food is one of the most fundamental ways to restore balance to our chaotic lives, and our goal is to share the things we have learned about the healing power of eating with a holistic perspective!

The relationship between our bodies and our food is fundamental, yet very complex, and we believe that each person's specific needs are very different.  For example, some people might benefit from a vegan diet, while for others a vegan diet may lack the nutritional content for the body and/or mind to operate optimally.  The primary mission of The Food is Medicine Project to encourage individuals toward self-discovery, to help individuals to understand how the food they eat affects their specific biology and physiology. We believe that many illnesses, physical and mental, either have their root origins in, or can be addressed by, making adjustments in the diet. We have personally discovered that our own physical and mental well-being at any given time is most affected by the quality of our last few meals. A comprehensive process of discovery should be very scientific and should take into account a person's intuitions about their own dietary needs, as only an individual can be fully aware of how his or her body is being affected. Only through an ongoing process of procedure and observation can a person discern their own bio-specificity, and by extension, optimal physical and mental performance.

The Food is Medicine Project was launched earlier this year in March and has hit the ground running with an innovative, non-dogmatic approach to wellness.  The main operations of our center will be hosting retreats, farm-to-table dinners and other forms of agritourism. The center will also create or participate in an existing CSA program so that our medicinal foods can be widely distributed into the community.  Over time we will implement efficient resource management programs like solar power generation and water recycling in order to become more resilient and sustainable.  We would also like to support, introduce or participate in urban permaculture efforts in the Winston-Salem community. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable or uninterested in making a financial contribution but are passionate about our cause, there are plenty of other ways to help:

·  Help us spread the word and make some noise about The Food is Medicine Project and our campaign!  There are some great social media sharing tools on this page!

·  Visit our web site and sign up for our monthly newsletter!  Both contain a wealth of recipes and information about medicinal foods!

·  E-mail us with your questions, ideas, suggestions, and feedback!  We are here to be part of community and we would love you make your acquaintance. 

·  Consider volunteering with us in the future!  We’re going to need all the extra hands we can find to develop our envisioned facility!  We to hope to take on WWOOFers as early as March, 2016!

·  Are you a holistic or alternative medicine practitioner?  Are you an instructor for permaculture design or other regrarian technique?  Contact us about collaborating on a retreat when the center is operational!

Who We Are
The Food is Medicine Project is an idea that the foods we put into our bodies can be highly effective medicines for treating a vast majority of the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual diseases currently plaguing the human population.  We recognize these illnesses as being a major obstacle preventing many of our human brothers and sisters from leading fulfilling lives.  We believe that Hippocrates’ notion to “let food be our medicine and medicine be our food” is a crucial piece of the puzzle as to why, when our technological and intellectual abilities are more developed than ever, our basic wellness is in its worst decline.  From the perspective of this philosophy it’s evident that part of the problem is our disconnection from the natural systems than sustain our existence.  We have forgotten that food is medicine, but we can remember, and we hope to help individuals in their personal healing processes through service and education.
Now more than ever our food is at the focus of many controversies.  Somewhere under the heap of arguments about vegetarianism, the omnivore’s dilemma, large scale industrial farming, GMOs, organic, labeling laws, free trade, high fructose corn syrup, cattle industry standards, poultry industry standards, the FDA, the raw milk controversy, celiac disease and a plethora of other food allergies and intolerances, there is a forgotten philosophy.  At the root of these issues is the forgotten concept that food is more than just fuel, eating is more than just a habitual activity, and that meals are more than just an opportunity to gather and socialize. 
Why We Chose Crowd Funding
Since it's our philosophy that we are all
irrefutably connected, we are excited to participate in the crowd funding.  No other economic medium has ever existed
that makes it so easy for us to spread our love and energy to so many others as efficiently.  The potential to connect to
millions of individuals who may be interested in supporting your cause is
nothing short of magic.  It reinforces
part of our philosophy that there is an abundance of love and universal support
for people when they’re pursuing their personal legends.  There are many projects out there that we at
The Food is Medicine Project support and wish to see succeed, and we support
many of them financially by making small pledges.  In honesty and vulnerability, we cannot
downplay the discomfort experienced by the ego when campaigning for funds from
family, friends and strangers.  It is
uncomfortable to pull back the curtain, show the world your dreams and ask for
their support.  But in our desires to be
connected, to heal the gap of separation between our individual selves and our
human brothers and sisters, we support this economic bridge called crowd
funding and are grateful for the opportunity to participate.  “The hand that is open to give is also open
to receive.”  May we give and receive
freely with ever accumulating love and respect for each other, our dreams and
our projects.
More About The Food Is Medicine Project
The word Medicine comes from the
Latin nouns 'medi', meaning "middle, center, or balance point," and
'cinus', meaning "ruin, destruction, or chaos."  The word Medicine actually translates
"to bring balance to that which was once in ruin," or "to return
to balance that which has fallen into chaos."  Our philosophy is that Food IS Medicine!  We believe that food is one of the most
fundamental ways to restore balance to our chaotic lives, and our goal is to
share the things we have learned about the healing power of eating with a holistic
perspective!
The relationship
between our bodies and our food is fundamental, yet very complex, and we
believe that each person's specific needs are very different.  For example, some people might benefit from a
vegan diet, while for others a vegan diet may lack the nutritional content for
the body and/or mind to operate optimally. 
The primary mission of The Food is Medicine Project to encourage
individuals toward self-discovery, to help individuals to understand how
the food they eat affects their specific biology and physiology. We believe
that many illnesses, physical and mental, either have their root origins in, or
can be addressed by, making adjustments in the diet. We have personally
discovered that our own physical and mental well-being at any given time is most
affected by the quality of our last few meals. A comprehensive process of
discovery should be very scientific and should take into account a person's
intuitions about their own dietary needs, as only an individual can be fully
aware of how his or her body is being affected. Only through an ongoing process
of procedure and observation can a person discern their own bio-specificity,
and by extension, optimal physical and mental performance.
The Food is Medicine Project was
launched earlier this year in March and has hit the ground running with an
innovative, non-dogmatic approach to wellness.  The main operations of our center will be hosting
retreats, farm-to-table dinners and other forms of agritourism. The center will
also create or participate in an existing CSA program so that our medicinal
foods can be widely distributed into the community.  Over time we will implement efficient resource
management programs like solar power generation and water recycling in order to
become more resilient and sustainable.  We would also like to support,
introduce or participate in urban permaculture efforts in the Winston-Salem
community.  
Other Ways You Can Help
If you are unable or uninterested
in making a financial contribution but are passionate about our cause, there
are plenty of other ways to help:
· 
Help us
spread the word and make some noise about The Food is Medicine Project and our
campaign!  There are some great social
media sharing tools on this page!
· 
Visit our
web site and sign up for our monthly newsletter!  Both contain a wealth of recipes and information
about medicinal foods!
· 
E-mail us
with your questions, ideas, suggestions, and feedback!  We are here to be part of community and we
would love you make your acquaintance.  
· 
Consider
volunteering with us in the future! 
We’re going to need all the extra hands we can find to develop our
envisioned facility!  We to hope to take
on WWOOFers as early as March, 2016!
· 
Are you a
holistic or alternative medicine practitioner? 
Are you an instructor for permaculture design or other regrarian
technique?  Contact us about
collaborating on a retreat when the center is operational!

story:
HOW AM I ?

To be born and raised in place considered to be one of the most dangerous places with limited resources and came up with such a brilliant product is what they call " REAL SUCCESS ". MAJD MASHHARAWI is a Civil Engineer from Gaza who is capable of changing the stereotype about women in Gaza which stated that women are not suitable for engineering major as it requires hardworking and muscular abilities. She has faced rejection with huge determination and strong belief that ladies are the next leaders of the world.

During her life in university, she focused on understanding engineering in a creative way. One resource was not enough to feed their hunger of education. She is very passionate and dedicate  towards her dream. She is always promising that she will leave this world making an unforgettable change and she already did !

 

PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED?

1. Ash Problem: The world in the last few decades depends on Coal combustion to generate electricity. This process results an enormous amounts of Ash. This unusable by-product powder buried underground and causing direct pollution to the ground water as it permeates quickly through soil particles. Paying attention to the environmental condition attached to the coal combustion here in Gaza Strip, more than 7 tons are produced weekly by Alfakhoora places ( These place are burning coal and wood to generate high degrees of temperature for drying food pots)  and this leads to uncontrolled environmental issue.  

2. Quality, Price and Weight of local ordinary blocks: As result of people continues focus on the blocks prices in Gaza as construction material especially the cement are very expensive and there are many political restrictions and  SIEGE since 2006 , the price will be very high and so on most blocks manufacturing plants produce building blocks under estimated standards only to make more profits with very low quality of those building blocks. In addition, there is no lightweight blocks in Gaza as it is prohibited and not allowed to be exported form outside!

 

IS GREENCAKE THE SOLUTION?

GreenCake blocks are the ultimate solution for these environmental problems as they consist of Ash which replaces the Aggregate and sand in ordinary blocks as a filler material. In addition, this powdered material gives many unique characteristics to the blocks such as creating a lighter blocks and much stronger ones. Moreover, the cost of the ordinary block is more than double the cost of GreenCake blocks. GreenCake blocks are also environmentally friendly blocks with high quality and low cost.

 

VISION AND MISSION !

VISION : To use construction and look after our environment.

MISSION: Creating an environmentally friendly building blocks based on the disposal coal and wood ash given that more than 600 miliion tons of ash are produced annually in Gaza.

 

 

WHERE GREENCAKE WERE AND WHERE DID IT REACH !

THE GREENCAKE JOURNEY FROM PAPER TO BLOCK ( BETWEEN RESEARCH AND APPLICATION )

1- GreenCake participated in a start-up incubator called Mobaderoon III project: Mobaderoon gave the team a lot of knowledge about the world of entrepreneurship, it opened many doors for them to establish the first prototype of GreenCake. Our team became more familiar and involved with the business environment and had meetings with many experts that provided the feedback needed in order to maintain success.

 

2- MIT semi-finals

To move forward with the project, the team participated in MIT competition for Arab start-up projects and their project were selected among 70 participants to the semi-finalists of the competition, let me mention that more than five thousands entrepreneurs applied and only 70 were selected!. So therefore, this was a great boost to our GreenCake team. Unfortunately luck is not always on your side and the team were not able to travel because of the political situation and borders to complete the competition.

3- Japan-Gaza Innovation Challenge : by 1st August, 2016 Majd decided to stop the project after all the setbacks she had faced. Miki – Majd’s friend - had advised her to apply for another challenge in Gaza held and funded by a Japanese team ( Japan Gaza Innovation Challenge). She attended the boot camp that they prepared and it was EXTREMELY inspiring ! The Japanese gave her the bright light of hope again, and she WON THE FIRST PRIZE !

She was very happy to be a part of this venture with these talented Japanese people. They were always supporting her and gave her hope and power to continue this long and hard journey. She is going to go to Japan in March to get training there.

 

NHK TALKED ABOUT US ♥

 

4- Our first practical construction was SEPTEMBER 2016 .

A man called Mr.Basheer contacted Majd and asked for blocks for his external wall which was (16X2.8X2) and (20X2.8X2) And here is the process:

A. Producing the blocks in the factory we rented for a week

B. Lifting the blocks to the Targeted place 

C. Starting building with GREENCAKE

And the Final one is : 
 

 

5- ZINC video : Here she is, with a video reaching more than 9.5 Million views !! to give hope to Gazan and the whole world that we are capable of making the IMPOSSIBLE POSSIBLE.

https://www.facebook.com/ThisIsZinc/videos/558914797642524/?pnref=story

 

WHY GREENCAKE AND NOT ORDINARY BLOCKS !

♥ TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERNS ♥

♥ BE THE CHANGE THAT YOU WISH TO SEE IN THE WORLD Gandhi ♥

For many decades, Gaza has been subjected to extreme situations such as three wars in 6 years and forced siege for 10 years. This has created a product and material shortage in the strip especially with respect to the construction materials, where the demand of building units is increasing annually. For example, the demand of building blocks has reached up to 40,000 blocks daily.

Simultaneously, with Gaza's situation, the world is facing a major environmental impact due to the inefficient action caused by industries around the globe. One of the major contributions in this environmental catastrophes is coal combustion, which results huge amounts of ash that are disposed of without concern for the environment and Gaza gets a share of 6 tons/weekly !

Because of the fact that Majd is a civil engineer, she is able to reunite environment and construction which has been one of my goals in this life thanks to her interests into material science. And to achieve this objective, she had to understand our construction conditions in Gaza strip and analyze it needs. This has motivated her friend Rawan as well as herself to create an urgent solution that could be adaptable, affordable, durable and always available to compensate the market gap. It all begins with our senior project ideas, which was mainly about light weight building blocks such as Aircrete blocks.

But it wasn't satisfying enough for Majd to apply something that had been already used and produced before. So she started her journey of research and it resulted with the birth of GreenCake blocks are mainly dependent on ash derived from coal combustion with other additives materials .

Despite the accomplishment we have reached with GreenCake, the road of it was full of obstacles and failures. However, every time there is a setback she is reminded that in order to achieve success we have to overcome these obstacles and delete the word failure from dictionary.

Replacing aggregate and sand with ash allowed the block to acquire its lightweight feature that can help Gazan to expand their areas and heights of buildings. Moreover, the price of GreenCake block is less than the ordinary block because of the efficient use of cement. I am seeking to find an alternative of cement and get rid of it from the block mixture as the price of it is increasing due to the siege.

When the team first got the minimum required strength of standard building blocks, Majd was overcome with happiness to know that she just got one step closer to her dream and goal in this life, which is leaving a fingerprint and making the world a better place to live in, starting from developing her own home country Gaza.

The journey of thousands miles starts with one step, she took a chance and took a step to show the world the power of a Palestinian woman as a nation builder and developer. I believe in that there are no limitations to our abilities if we use them significantly to serve our world.

HOW MUCH DO WE NEED AND FOR WHAT !

Purpose : We want to develop the GreenCake block and do further testing in order to establish a mini production line for GREENCAKE in Gaza and we are seeking to collect the required amount of fund to achieve this goal.

Production Flow chart : Here is the process of creating the GreenCake

Budget Required to sustain the production line for the first year of production: 

​- Registration fees + insurance = 3,000 $

- Renting a plant ( with mixer + full automatic molding machine + forklift + molds ) = 10,000 $

- A plant for making blocks by using steam and high pressure= 10,000 $.

- Sieving machine ( locally manufactured ) = 5,000 $ 

- Raw materials for the first three months of working = 20,000 $

- Consultation and Technical supervision expenses = 5,000 $

- Marketing fees = 2,000 $ 

GREENCAKE IN JOURNALISM :)

1- ZINC

https://www.facebook.com/ThisIsZinc/videos/558914797642524/?pnref=story
 

2- ALJAZEERA 

3-ALHURRA

 

4- UNRWA 

http://www.unrwa.org/newsroom/press-releases/unrwa-celebrates-winners-gaza-entrepreneur-challenge

5- WATAN NEWS AGENCY

6- Alalam Channel

7- TRT ARABIA 

8- hijab-in

http://hijab-in.com/green-cake-gaza/

9- french.palinfo

https://french.palinfo.com/news/2016/3/16/Les-jeunes-ing%C3%A9nieures-de-Gaza-et-une-brique-respectueuse-de-l%E2%80%99environnement

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

- You can help us expanding the project by sharing our FACEBOOK PAGE ♥
https://www.facebook.com/greencakeblocks/

AND HELP US TO SHARE THE CAMPAIGN LINK ♥

story:
Version Française plus bas (French version lower)

Our Partners: https://new-r.net/2017/03/13/partenaires-partne... 

Personalities who support us: https://new-r.net/personalities-who-support/

(House realized by New eRa)

Hello everyone !

First of all, I would like to thank all of you for considering my project !

Have a pleasant reading ! 

Who we are :

(Julian speaking)

Born into a family of several generations builders, my father for 40 years and myself for 10 years, we have perfected construction and rehabilitation works, Through time and hard work, we’re proud to say that we have achieved a form of respect from our peers

We try our best to always be on the cutting edge of technology ; honed from practical experience, our technique has been sharpened over time.

This is how we have examined and then developed for 10 years our ecological houses building process. The specified process which obtained the french approbations and the building compulsory insurance. We have already built several homes like this by craftsmen and our construction performances outreach french standards.

Fire tests established by french institutes led to positive results and concluded that the resistance is higher than traditional constructions.

 

The New Era’s project :

 Construction of an eco-factory with a manufacturing capacity which may vary according to the need, from 1000 to 3000 houses per year.

This factory will be built with natural materials and the factory could higlhy reduce the construction cost and to make accessible the houses to the greatest number of people.

Wastes will be used by a new generation gasification plant with very strong profitability for the energy and ecological production able to supply this plant and vehicles.

Manufacturing, delivery and assembly of houses whose parts are ready to be assembled.

The main objective is to have a local production : not to import any raw material (wood, straw, land). There should be no loss.

Straw is a waste often burnt, so it shall be recovered.

Harvested trees for timber exploitation shall be replanted. Moreover for the wood, we will only work with Forest loggers with a label like Pan-european forest certification (PEFC) , at any rate, who respect the 9th of july 2001 forestry law.

PEFC: https://www.pefc.org/

(http://www.assemblee-nationale.fr/11/dossiers/foret.asp 

English version : 

Forest orientation draft law (Joint Committee, No 3169).
After a second reading the 29 May 2001 by the National Assembly, the bill was adopted by the Senate at the second reading the 13 june 2001 with modifications. The joint Committee which met the 20 june 2001 has reached an agreement on on the provision under discussion.
Rapporteur on behalf of the production commission : Mr François Brottes, socialist, Isère.
The main purpose of this bill :
Reinforce the forest environnemental and economics functions through :
- the development and the competitiviness of forest-timber sector,
- a sustainable management and polyvalent policy of the forests,
- the protection of the natural forest ecosystem,
- a better organisation of the institutions and the professions relating to the forest
- an incitative for Forest Investment.)

(All contributors will have their name on the Factory walls)

Why this project is a true-value ?

As the ecological challenge is vital for the Planet, , unlike the whole constructions made nowdays, we don’t use any manufactured or processed material throught grey energy nor fossile ressources for our build. For example : for producing insulation such as polystyrene, glass wool, bricks…, manufacturies consume  a lot of fossil energy.

Walls will be built differently according to whether you are in Asia, France or anywhere. Indeed, in order to obtain the best insulation, several technical factors are to be met depending on, among other things, hygometry.

These houses are in fact like breathing and living organic matters, providing self-regulation and very law energy consumption.

Severe lack of housing is being increasingly recognised everywhere in the world.

Implement our project would be the beginning of an adequate response to this shortage.

For this design could be duplicated as may be necessary.

Unemployment is a scourge affecting our society.

Our concept involves implementing training programs for new construction professions.

To get our project started, about 1500 jobs will be created and replicated in each new plant.

Nowdays, a large part of population develops allergies. By 2050, the specialists announce that one in two inhabitant in the world will have allergies. Nowdays, some of these are caused by construction materials. Our technique using natural and unprocessed materials, can therefore eliminate any allergy linked with such phenomenom.

(House realized by New eRa)

All we need :

The cost of constructing a plant is 75 000 000, 00 EUR (84 500 000 USD.)

If we obtain at least 20 % of the amount , for a total of 15 000 000,00 EUR (16 906 000 USD) (plus 10 per cent of Indiegogo charge and banking costs), we could borrow from banks and obtain financial guarantees. If we get more, we will have less money to borrow to complete easily our project. We will also request financial help from the Foundation and the NGOs. At the same time, we are working with a law practice specializing in fundraising.

In case we have less financial support, we will manufacture a smaller plant but if we obtain more, we could open more factories in several countries.

 

COST OF A PLANT MANUFACTURING

GRADING + Roads and Utilities

NEW FRAME  ROOFING

FOUNDATION + PAVING

WALLS

INSTALLATION

SEALANT

PLUMBING + AIR + FACTORY FLUID

FACTORY ELECTRICITY / PRODUCTION AREA

FACTORY ELECTRICITY / STORAGE AREA

STORAGE ELECTRICITY

CARPENTRY EQUIPMENT / WINDOWS MANUFACTURING

KITCHEN WORKTOP, DOORS

FIRE HOSE CABINET FACTORY + STORAGE

Included rainwater storage + pumps under the storage building

GENERATORS

LOGISTICS (trucks - backhoe loaders – Buses to collect employees and bring them to work

OFFICES FLOOR, SCHOOL  10 500 Square Meters

MANUFACTURING 5

TRAINING STAFF FEES

+ Housing and Various things for 1 year

ENERGY PLANT FOR THE 5 ASSEMBLY LINES HEATING

STORAGE BUILDING FOR 1 YEAR (75 000 Square Meters)

STUDY ASSET FEES

===================

75 000 000.00 Euros

84 532 500,00 USD

 

 

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Nos partenaires: https://new-r.net/2017/03/13/partenaires-partne...

Personnalités qui nous soutiennent: https://new-r.net/personalities-who-support/

(Maison réalisée par New eRa)

Bonjour à tous! 

Tout d'abord, merci pour toute l'attention que vous porterez à notre projet! Bonne lecture!

Qui sommes-nous?

(paroles de Julian)

Issus d’une famille de bâtisseurs depuis plusieurs générations, mon père depuis 40 ans et moi-même depuis 10 ans, nous maîtrisons parfaitement les ouvrages de construction et rénovation et sommes reconnus professionnellement par nos paires. (www.zenithmaitredoeuvre.com)

Toujours à la pointe des nouveautés, forts de notre expérience sur le terrain, notre technique s’est affûtée au cours du temps. C’est ainsi que durant une dizaine d’année nous avons analysé, étudié puis développé notre processus de construction de maisons écologiques. Processus qui a obtenu les approbations de la  France et les assurances obligatoires pour la construction. Nous avons déjà construit de façon artisanale plusieurs maisons de ce type et les performances de notre construction vont au delà des normes en vigueur françaises.

Les tests  au feu établis par des instituts français ont été concluants et ont démontré que la résistance est supérieure aux constructions traditionnelles.

Le projet New eRa :

Construction d’une usine écologique dont la capacité de fabrication pourra varier selon le besoin, entre 1000 à 3000 maisons par an.

La construction de cette usine se fera avec des matériaux naturels et l'usine permettra de réduire fortement le coût de construction et de rendre les maisons accessibles au plus grand nombre.

Les déchets produits seront utilisés par une centrale de gazéification nouvelle génération à très forte rentabilité pour la production énergétique écologique permettant d’alimenter l’usine et les véhicules.

Fabrication, livraison et montage des maisons qui sortent en pièces prêtes à être assemblées.

Le but final étant de ne rien importer pour ce qui est de la matière première (bois, paille, terre) et de n’avoir aucune perte, nous devrons tout produire localement.

La paille est un déchet souvent brûlé, elle sera donc valorisée.

Les arbres récoltés pour l’exploitation du bois devront être replantés. De plus pour le bois, nous ne travaillerons qu'avec des exploitants forestiers ayant un label style "PEFC", en tous cas, respectant la loi forestière du 9 juillet 2001 (http://www.assemblee-nationale.fr/11/dossiers/foret.asp).

PEFC: http://www.pefc-france.org/

(Chaque contributeur aura son nom inscrit sur le mur de l'usine)

Pourquoi ce projet a-t-il une vraie valeur ?

Le défit écologique étant vital pour la Planète, contrairement à l’ensemble des constructions faites aujourd’hui, notre procédé n’emploie aucun matériau fabriqué ou transformé par le biais d’énergie grise ou fossile. Exemple : pour fabriquer des isolants tels que polystyrène, laine de verre, brique, ..., les usines consomment énormément d’énergie fossile.

Les murs ne seront pas construits de la même façon selon que l’on soit en Asie, en France ou ailleurs. En effet plusieurs paramètres doivent être respectés en fonction entre autres de l’hygrométrie afin d’obtenir la meilleur isolation. En effet, ces maisons sont comme des êtres vivants qui respirent, ce qui permet l’autorégulation et une consommation énergétique très faible.

Le manque cruel de logements partout dans le monde est reconnu. Pouvoir donner le jour à notre projet serait le commencement d’une réponse appropriée à cette pénurie. Car en effet, ce modèle pourra être dupliqué autant de fois que nécessaire.

Le chômage également est un mal de notre société. Notre concept prévoit la mise en œuvre de formation aux nouveaux métiers. Pour démarrer notre projet, 1500 postes environ seront créés, 1500 postes qui seront dupliqués à chaque nouvelle usine.

De nos jours une forte partie de la population développe des allergies. D’ici 2050 les spécialistes annoncent que dans le monde un habitant sur deux développera des allergies. De nos jours certaines d’entre elles sont dues aux matériaux employés dans la construction. Notre procédé n’utilisant que des matériaux naturels et non traités permet donc d’éliminer toute allergie liée à ce phénomène.

(Maison réalisée par New eRa)

 Ce dont nous avons besoin:

Le coût de la construction de l’usine est de 75 000 000,00 d’euros (84 532 500,00 USD).

Obtenir un minimum de 20% de la somme, soit 15 000 000.00 d’euros (16 906 000 USD)(plus 10% de frais Indiegogo et bancaire) nous permettrait d’emprunter auprès des banques, d’obtenir des garanties financières. Si nous obtenons plus, cela nous fera moins d’argent à emprunter et cela facilitera la réalisation du projet. Nous allons également solliciter le concours de fondations et d’ONG. Nous travaillons en parallèle  avec un cabinet d’avocats spécialisés dans les recherches de fonds.

Dans le cas où nous obtenons moins, nous réaliserons une usine plus petite. Si nous obtenons plus de fonds nous ouvrirons d'autres usines dans d'autres pays.

 

PRIX DE CONSTRUCTION DE L'USINE:

- TERRASSEMENT + VRD

- CHARPENTE TOITURE         

- FONDATION + DALLAGE 

- MURS 

- POSE 

- ENDUIT 

- PLOMBERIE + AIR + FLUIDE USINE  

- ELECTRICITE USINE PARTIE PRODUCTION  

- ELECTRICITE USINE PARTIE STOCKAGE  

- ELECTRICITE STOCKAGE

 - MATÉRIELS MENUISERIES FABRICATION FENËTRES,

- PLAN DE TRAVAIL CUISINE,  PORTES

- RIA INCENDIE USINE + STOCKAGE

Y compris stockage des eaux de pluie + pompes sous le bâtiment de stockage

- GROUPES ELECTROGENES

- LOGISTIQUE (camions – tractopelles - bus de ramassage ...)

- ETAGE BUREAUX, ECOLE 10 500 M² 

- UNITES DE FABRICATION 5 

- HONORAIRES PERSONNELS DE FORMATION                                                                               

+ Logements et Divers pour 1an  

- CENTRALE ENERGETIQUE POUR L'ALIMENTATION DES CINQ CHAINES DE PRODUCTION 

- BÂTIMENT STOCKAGE pour UNE ANNÉE 75 000 M²                                                                           

- HONORAIRES ETUDE GESTION 

    

======================

 PRIX TTC     75 000 000.00 €

                        84 532 500,00 USD

Version Française plus bas (French version lower)
Our Partners: https://new-r.net/2017/03/13/partenaires-partne... 
Personalities who support us: https://new-r.net/personalities-who-support/

(House realized by New eRa)
Hello everyone !
First of all, I would like to thank all of you for considering my project !
Have a pleasant reading ! 
Who we are :

(Julian speaking)
Born into a family of several generations builders, my father for 40 years and myself for 10 years, we have perfected construction and rehabilitation works, Through time and hard work, we’re proud to say that we have achieved a form of respect from our peers
We try our best to always be on the cutting edge of technology ; honed from practical experience, our technique has been sharpened over time.
This is how we have examined and then developed for 10 years our ecological houses building process. The specified process which obtained the french approbations and the building compulsory insurance. We have already built several homes like this by craftsmen and our construction performances outreach french standards.
Fire tests established by french institutes led to positive results and concluded that the resistance is higher than traditional constructions.
 
The New Era’s project :

 Construction of an eco-factory with a manufacturing capacity which may vary according to the need, from 1000 to 3000 houses per year.
This factory will be built with natural materials and the factory could higlhy reduce the construction cost and to make accessible the houses to the greatest number of people.
Wastes will be used by a new generation gasification plant with very strong profitability for the energy and ecological production able to supply this plant and vehicles.
Manufacturing, delivery and assembly of houses whose parts are ready to be assembled.
The main objective is to have a local production : not to import any raw material (wood, straw, land). There should be no loss.
Straw is a waste often burnt, so it shall be recovered.
Harvested trees for timber exploitation shall be replanted. Moreover for the wood, we will only work with Forest loggers with a label like Pan-european forest certification (PEFC) , at any rate, who respect the 9th of july 2001 forestry law.
PEFC: https://www.pefc.org/
(http://www.assemblee-nationale.fr/11/dossiers/foret.asp 
English version : 
Forest orientation draft law (Joint Committee, No 3169).After a second reading the 29 May 2001 by the National Assembly, the bill was adopted by the Senate at the second reading the 13 june 2001 with modifications. The joint Committee which met the 20 june 2001 has reached an agreement on on the provision under discussion.Rapporteur on behalf of the production commission : Mr François Brottes, socialist, Isère.The main purpose of this bill :Reinforce the forest environnemental and economics functions through :- the development and the competitiviness of forest-timber sector,- a sustainable management and polyvalent policy of the forests,- the protection of the natural forest ecosystem,- a better organisation of the institutions and the professions relating to the forest- an incitative for Forest Investment.)

(All contributors will have their name on the Factory walls)
Why this project is a true-value ?
As the ecological challenge is vital for the Planet, , unlike the whole constructions made nowdays, we don’t use any manufactured or processed material throught grey energy nor fossile ressources for our build. For example : for producing insulation such as polystyrene, glass wool, bricks…, manufacturies consume  a lot of fossil energy.
Walls will be built differently according to whether you are in Asia, France or anywhere. Indeed, in order to obtain the best insulation, several technical factors are to be met depending on, among other things, hygometry.
These houses are in fact like breathing and living organic matters, providing self-regulation and very law energy consumption.
Severe lack of housing is being increasingly recognised everywhere in the world.
Implement our project would be the beginning of an adequate response to this shortage.
For this design could be duplicated as may be necessary.
Unemployment is a scourge affecting our society.
Our concept involves implementing training programs for new construction professions.
To get our project started, about 1500 jobs will be created and replicated in each new plant.
Nowdays, a large part of population develops allergies. By 2050, the specialists announce that one in two inhabitant in the world will have allergies. Nowdays, some of these are caused by construction materials. Our technique using natural and unprocessed materials, can therefore eliminate any allergy linked with such phenomenom.

(House realized by New eRa)
All we need :
The cost of constructing a plant is 75 000 000, 00 EUR (84 500 000 USD.)
If we obtain at least 20 % of the amount , for a total of 15 000 000,00 EUR (16 906 000 USD) (plus 10 per cent of Indiegogo charge and banking costs), we could borrow from banks and obtain financial guarantees. If we get more, we will have less money to borrow to complete easily our project. We will also request financial help from the Foundation and the NGOs. At the same time, we are working with a law practice specializing in fundraising.
In case we have less financial support, we will manufacture a smaller plant but if we obtain more, we could open more factories in several countries.
 
COST OF A PLANT MANUFACTURING
GRADING + Roads and Utilities
NEW FRAME  ROOFING
FOUNDATION + PAVING
WALLS
INSTALLATION
SEALANT
PLUMBING + AIR + FACTORY FLUID
FACTORY ELECTRICITY / PRODUCTION AREA
FACTORY ELECTRICITY / STORAGE AREA
STORAGE ELECTRICITY
CARPENTRY EQUIPMENT / WINDOWS MANUFACTURING
KITCHEN WORKTOP, DOORS
FIRE HOSE CABINET FACTORY + STORAGE
Included rainwater storage + pumps under the storage building
GENERATORS
LOGISTICS (trucks - backhoe loaders – Buses to collect employees and bring them to work
OFFICES FLOOR, SCHOOL  10 500 Square Meters
MANUFACTURING 5
TRAINING STAFF FEES
+ Housing and Various things for 1 year
ENERGY PLANT FOR THE 5 ASSEMBLY LINES HEATING
STORAGE BUILDING FOR 1 YEAR (75 000 Square Meters)
STUDY ASSET FEES
===================
75 000 000.00 Euros
84 532 500,00 USD
 
 
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
 
Nos partenaires: https://new-r.net/2017/03/13/partenaires-partne...
Personnalités qui nous soutiennent: https://new-r.net/personalities-who-support/

(Maison réalisée par New eRa)

story:
Help Bring Clever Buoy's

Shark Monitoring System to More Beaches. Donate.

Clever Buoy™ is an autonomous marine monitoring system developed by Australian company, Smart Marine Systems (SMS).  The system is an ocean monitoring platform that specializes in detecting large marine life using state of the art sonar and identification software systems to relay critical information to authorities responsible for beach safety. 

For the safety of all swimmers and surfers in California, we’re planning to install a pilot Clever Buoy system in the Corona Del Mar, the site of a serious but non-fatal attack on Maria Korcsmaros in May 2016. The installation will demonstrate the effectiveness of the  system in detecting and alerting the presence of sharks and ensure that it passes the strong California environmental regulations.

 

As Seen On

             

 

How Clever Buoy Works

The monitoring system is designed to be deployed beyond the surf zone and utilizes multi beam sonar transducers that are mounted on the ocean floor coupled with newly developed detection software to scan for marine life.  The system creates a “virtual net” at the deployment locations and once an object is detected in the area, the software interrogates the target’s swimming pattern to determine the type of object and potential species. 

If the target is determined to exhibit shark like movement patterns, information is transmitted to lifeguards within seconds notifying them of the target and the location via a real-time mobile application with automated notifications and warning information.
 
Clever Buoy™ is unique in the market as a viable commercially-available shark mitigation method, using non-invasive technology solutions suitable to protect high intensity surf zones. The stability and robustness of the current Clever Buoy™ platform has been verified to sustainably operate in open ocean conditions 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, autonomously monitoring marine life and alerting the presence of large animals which could be a threat to beach users. 

All beachgoers benefit from Clever Buoy: swimmers, snorkelers, divers and surfers, because knowing when a dangerous predator is lurking nearby gives lifeguards the tools to manage the beach safely.

Help us get a pilot Clever Buoy installation into the water in 2018 for demonstration. Please donate now.

 

PERKS

$35 Donation: Clever Buoy T-shirt

$70 Shark Attack Mitigation Systems Sticker (up to 6 feet)

The SAMS™ Diverter design breaks up the silhouette of the Board to appear as separate objects and unlike normal shark prey, such as a seal.

This is a marine-grade adhesive vinyl sticker that is applied to the bottom of your board. It comes in several sizes with easy to apply instructions, application fluid and takes minutes to apply. SAMS Technology applies newly discovered scientific principles of shark vision to the development of marine materials configured with specific patterns of color, contrast, size and shape to present the wearer or object as either cryptic (disruptively colored) or conspicuous in the ocean.  The principles are based on the physiology of what predatory sharks can see at different depths, from various angles, in different light conditions, and times of the day.


 

$75 Donation: Clever Buoy Hoodie by SMS

$250 Donation: 8’ WaveStorm Surfboard

With your donation of $250, you get a custom Wavestorm Surfboard! The 8’0” WaveStorm softboard is the biggest selling board in the world! Why? Because it’s fun to surf!! Available within one week of ordering.

$500 Donation: 9’6 WaveStorm Sup

With your donation of $500, you get a custom Wavestorm Sup! The 9’6” WaveStorm Sup is a great “How to Sup” starter board. Its soft deck makes it fun to ride and its 33” width makes it really stable for learning to paddle. It’s even fun to surf!

$1000 Donation: Surf/Sup Session for five at San Onofre Beach with Ian Cairns!

Bring your family or family and friends to enjoy a day on the water! Instruction will include a surf/sup lesson by a world renowned surfer and shark expert!

 

$3000 Donation: Shark Boat Tour out of Dana Point Harbor for five guests with leading shark expert and lunch on the water.

Bring five of your friends or family for a day of shark exploring on the water!

$5000 Donation: Original artwork from renowned marine life artist, Wyland.

Renowned marine life artist Wyland changed the way people think about our environment when he started painting life-size whales on the sides of buildings in the 1980s.

Today, the Wyland name has become synonymous with the new generation of awareness about environmental conservation. Through his unique marine life paintings, sculptures, and photography, Wyland has inspired a generation about the importance of marine life conservation.

 

ABOUT US

 

 

Smart Marine Systems Ltd (SMS), is an Australian company based in Perth, Western Australia that has developed and commercialized award winning patented marine products.
 
The Company was founded by Hamish Jolly and Craig Anderson, both of whom are passionate ocean users who set out on a mission in 2011 to better understand shark behavior following a rapid increase in fatal shark attacks in their local waters.  The surrounding ocean of Western Australia witnessed 6 deaths in the period between August 2010 and July 2012 (ISAF, Florida Museum) and became a global focal point for research and innovation in the field of shark science.
 
Smart Marine Systems current product portfolio includes;

SAMS™ [Shark Attack Mitigation Systems] Visual Technology which is applied to wetsuits and ocean-going watercraft to potentially reduce the risk of shark attack. Over the past five years SMS has researched and developed technology that is based on new understandings of the visual systems of large predatory sharks.  

Clever Buoy™ is a marine monitoring platform that contains a shark detection and response system that autonomously identifies large sharks from other species and sends warning signals to shore for human intervention response. .Clever Buoy™ technology has significant global application in providing beach users and researchers with critical location and environmental information, and aims to assist in ensuring that our beaches are safer.

Seabin™ is the revolutionary ocean plastics cleaning device that catches floating rubbish, oil, fuel and detergents and makes oceans cleaner. 

Smart Marine Systems has received global publicity and has become a recognized organization for information and technology solutions that can be deployed across oceans globally.

 

As Seen On

Renowned marine life artist Wyland changed the way people think about our environment when he started painting life-size whales on the sides of buildings in the 1980s.
Today, the Wyland name has become synonymous with the new generation of awareness about environmental conservation. Through his unique marine life paintings, sculptures, and photography, Wyland has inspired a generation about the importance of marine life conservation.

 
ABOUT US
 

 
Smart Marine Systems Ltd (SMS), is an Australian company based in Perth, Western Australia that has developed and commercialized award winning patented marine products. The Company was founded by Hamish Jolly and Craig Anderson, both of whom are passionate ocean users who set out on a mission in 2011 to better understand shark behavior following a rapid increase in fatal shark attacks in their local waters.  The surrounding ocean of Western Australia witnessed 6 deaths in the period between August 2010 and July 2012 (ISAF, Florida Museum) and became a global focal point for research and innovation in the field of shark science. Smart Marine Systems current product portfolio includes;
SAMS™ [Shark Attack Mitigation Systems] Visual Technology which is applied to wetsuits and ocean-going watercraft to potentially reduce the risk of shark attack. Over the past five years SMS has researched and developed technology that is based on new understandings of the visual systems of large predatory sharks.  
Clever Buoy™ is a marine monitoring platform that contains a shark detection and response system that autonomously identifies large sharks from other species and sends warning signals to shore for human intervention response. .Clever Buoy™ technology has significant global application in providing beach users and researchers with critical location and environmental information, and aims to assist in ensuring that our beaches are safer.
Seabin™ is the revolutionary ocean plastics cleaning device that catches floating rubbish, oil, fuel and detergents and makes oceans cleaner. 
Smart Marine Systems has received global publicity and has become a recognized organization for information and technology solutions that can be deployed across oceans globally.
 
As Seen On

story:
*Shirt shipping is listed as $4. This is for international. Unfortunately, the IndieGoGo site will not let us change the domestic pricing because the campaign is live. So that you know, $2 extra will be going to the campaign and I apologize for the inconvenience. The perk includes an extra sticker due to this.

Exploitation, through targeted as well as incidental catch, is one of the main global threats facing shark survival. Over-fishing is driving sharks to the brink of extinction - with many populations down by 80 percent. Tens of millions are killed each year for their meat, fins, liver, and other products, as many fisheries are unregulated and catch are significantly under-reported. Bycatch – catching sharks incidentally and indiscriminately while fishing for other commercial species – poses a significant threat to sharks.  Finning – the removal of shark fins and discard of the shark’s body at sea - is often associated with shark over-fishing, as keeping only the fins aboard the vessel allows fishermen to kill many more sharks than if they were required to bring back the entire animal. Fueling this practice is the fact that shark fins yield a much higher price than shark meat, providing an economic incentive for the wasteful and indefensible practice of finning. (Sourced from projectaware.org).

The annual volume for fin imports decreased 5% (from 17,682 tonnes (t) in 2000 to 16,815 t in 2011). This is good news and SharkFinShirts.com was conceived to continue to decrease this number. However, the annual volume for shark meat (including skate and rays) imports increased by 42% (from was 85,710 t in 2000 to 121,641 t in 2011). This is why we are pairing with Project AWARE, so that we can address the whole issue. The money raised is to save the whole shark, not just the fins.

My name is Michael O'Hearne. I appreciate you taking the time to read over this campaign and hope that this page, started on 2/22/18, inflamed your desire to learn more. Awareness of this issue is the first step. For more information on the current situation of the sharks and rays, and a list of the global legislation, agreements, and conventions that we advocate visit: projectaware.org/sharks.

Shark Fin Shirts is a Non-Profit. Logical Question: where does the profit go? Paired with Project AWARE (a global movement for ocean protection powered by a community of adventurers), all profits from sticker purchases and t-shirt purchases go to conservation and awareness efforts to stop shark-finning. All backer donations above the price of a t-shirt will be devoted, in their entirety, to Project AWARE's various initiatives. All of the following are offered as additional incentives to assist in the fundraising movements of Shark Fin Shirts; photo album access, exclusive music video preview, giant inflatable whales, and Michael's first guitar.

Over the past two years managing and performing with the band Shark Fin Soup, I learned a great deal about the dangers and effects of shark fin soup on the endangered population of sharks in the world’s oceans. At the last Shark Fin Soup concert (Feb. 17th, Fox Theatre) I announced the farewell of two band members. Propelled by the positive support of the local community and motivated by the other band members career goals and developments, I began initial thoughts of Shark Fin Shirts: An Anti-Finning Campaign. Shark Fin Shirts is my effort to continue with the momentum created by the band and to make a change.

sharkfinshirts.com

facebook.com/sharkfinshirts

reddit.com/r/sharks

story:
Short Summary

The Boghill Centre is a holistic retreat centre in the West of Ireland with over 25 years’ experience in catering for groups both large and small. Our focus is on eco-sustainability and environmental and spiritual education.  We try to create a safe space for workshops in the areas of meditation, team-building, healing, self-improvement and music.

We work with volunteers  and we have work-guests from all age groups and walks of life that help us with the running of the Centre. This is a conscious decision to give people the opportunity to learn and experience sustainability, organic farming, and to give them opportunities to broaden their world-view.

This year we decided to turn Boghill into a charity. We intend to use this new status to grow and to better serve our existing and new clients. This crowd funding campaign and your contributions will enable us to take great steps towards self-sufficiency, to broaden our positive environmental impact, and to improve on the relaxing, high-quality service we are known for.
 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are aiming for € 100,000 .

This will go to building eco accommodation for the work guests, a sustainable watering system for the poly tunnels and the building of a wood shed to pre-dry the wood for our boiler.
Any additional funds will go to erecting eco pods on the land that can be used as private accommodation and the design of a glamping site. 

All your donations will help us to achieve our goals and you will get something out of it as well. The rewards you can get for donating range from an annual membership of Friends of Boghill to your own cob building with your name on it!

 

The Impact

Accommodation for our volunteers

We would not be able to run this fantastic place without the work of our volunteers. And now that we are growing, producing more of our own vegetables and moving to even more sustainability, we need more of them than ever. We want to give them a great place to sleep and retire to after their hard day of work. The new accommodation with bedrooms, a small living room, compost toilets and solar showers will give them just that.

Water system for our poly tunnels

This year we have already put up two more poly tunnels and we are putting up an extra two in the coming month. To be able to water these tunnels we want to set up a rain water collection system so our vegetables can get the best care possible.  

Wood shed

We heat our water and the centre with a highly efficient wood-gassification boiler. This boiler needs dry wood and in our climate that means we need a good place to dry it. A large woodshed will make this possible. We will build it in a way that we will be able to fit the roof with solar panels once the grant for that comes through.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If for some reason you can't donate at this time, or you would like to help us in other ways, please share this campaign with as many people as you can. We also always really appreciate any donations of materials we can use for our projects or a helping hand!

story:
Website: www.cooldowntheplanet.com

Launch video: https://youtu.be/NwUgQIDlB3o

 

Our people are ready

At this very moment three junior reporters in three different countries are waiting for the green light to feature stories about climate change. Belal Taheri in Iran, Sarin Prom in Cambodja en Animul Islam in Bangladesh have been asked by us to wait until the initial sponsoring has been taken care of. Some dozens of young correspondents all over the world are in the starting blocks to cooperate as well. The proposed fees for them may be quite modest, for western standards even low budget, but the motivation to act is high.

That's why we start this campaign. To get the wheel into motion and the first dozens of videos about global warming financed. And to find one or two partners who are committed to take a share in our journey and can help scaling it up.

Our platform is ready

The website Cool Down The Planet has been completed in the last few months. It's supposed to become a semi-professional journalistic video platform that maps the regional impacts of climate change and human abilities to find solutions. Besides people can drop their own short video and express their views and concerns.

As a not-for-profit foundation based in the Netherlands, we want in the first place to commit young reporters and correspondents. Though more experienced professionals will be welcomed too on our platform.

When it comes to funding, we hope that a growing number of COOL partners will support our video mission. People and companies can adopt one or more future videos. They will be creditied for this in the video and on our website/social media.

Starting in the spring of 2019, we are endeavouring to launch an ever growing number of small and basic film projects around the world. Let's go for it and give it a try!

Are you ready?

Now - spring 2019 - we are at the stage of launching the videos and requesting you to join us. How can you be involved? Lend your (company) name to these videos, adopt one or more of them, and be a COOL sponsor.

It's a relatively low budget project! We need € 750,- per item for the first 26 video reports. This fee will be distributed fully to our correspondents, reporters and editor.

The videos will clearly show your (company) name in the credits. If you wish we can add your short video statement at the end of the sponsored film. Our website shows the examples. And of course your (company) name gets good visibility on our website/social media.

 

 

How did we come to this point?

The story of Cool Down the Planet is linked to a small group of TU Delft students brought together by the Dutch journalist-filmmaker Roelf van Til. That's me - the initiator of Cool Down the Planet and of this Indiegogo campaign. So forgive me to write in the 'first person'.

The phenomenon of climate change got ahold of me half of my professional life. As a professional TV-reporter, based in the Netherlands, With New Energy TV I committed myself 13 years ago to make films about sustainable energy solutions. It resulted in the production of many hundreds of small movies commissioned by energy companies, knowledge institutes and governments.

Delft University of Technology asked New Energy TV, supported by some students, to work out a plan to set up an international ‘online’ tool to reduce the impact of global warming. As a result – and after some detours – the concept of a grand journalistic video expedition was born. Why not try to document both the impact of climate change and the way people try to counter it? Why not start the first video channel about climate change?!

Running an international video channel did not really fit into the core business of an established Dutch university, and so it was up to us to take up the flag and upgrade our dreams and ideas all by ourselves. And so that's what we do. Now it's time to spread our wings and fly, but that will only succeed with your support!
